document.full_text: -sharif, afghanistan  - afghans protesting the burning of a koran by an obscure u.s. pastor over-ran a u.n. compound on friday and killed at least seven international staff in the deadliest-ever attack on the united nations in afghanistan.
document.title: worst attack on u.n. in afghanistan kills at least 7
lines_and_colors: -sharif, afghanistan  - afghans protesting the burning of a koran by an obscure u.s. pastor over-ran a u.n. compound on friday and killed at least seven international staff in the deadliest-ever attack on the united nations in afghanistan.
